subject: Tennis
Davis Cup
lead_paragraph: The Czech Republic won the Davis Cup for the first time as an independent nation Sunday, beating Spain, 3-2, in the final after Radek Stepanek upset Nicolas Almagro in the last reverse singles.
snippet: The Czech Republic won the Davis Cup for the first time as an independent nation Sunday, beating Spain, 3-2, in the final after Radek Stepanek upset Nicolas Almagro in the last reverse singles.
